name: Catch the Objects Sixth sense game
name_original: Catch the Objects Sixth sense game
description:
New Update is here!!!

Now there is another mode: Endless

You also have a highest score counter which will record your highest score.

To make the game more challenging, the speed of the objects increases gradually as your score becomes a multiple of 10.

A time delay of 2 seconds has been added so that you can adjust the game windows as per your needs.

Also all the previous bugs have been resolved!

Use a yellow object like fevistick, highlighter to control your player. Hold it in your hand and point it at your camera.

The position of the object in the camera will change the position of the player.

The game is detects yellow color. 

Note- Make sure that the color you are using is not present in your background. To help you understand which color the camera is detecting, I have added a red dot at the center of the object that the camera is detecting

Warning- The game will not start until you put the yellow(default) color in front of the camera

Enjoy!

To play more games like this click here.

Post your highest score in the comments section below
